item.title: cytoqc -- bcell
item.description: library(flowCore) library(flowWorkspace) library(cytoqc) path <- "~/remote/fh/fast/gottardo_r/mike_working/lyoplate_out/parsed" centers <- c('BIIR','CIMR','Miami','NHLBI','Stanford','UCLA','Yale') Load gs panel <- "bcell" gslist <- sapply(centers, function(center) { message("Center: ", center) gs <- load_gs(file.path(path, center, panel)) }) QC Check gates cqc_data <- cqc_gs_list(gslist) #group by gates groups <- cqc_check(cqc_data, "gate") groups group_id nGatingSet gate 2 6 24hi 38hi, 27- IgD-, 27- IgD+, 27+ IgD-, 27+ IgD+, 27hi 38hi, CD19, CD19 AND CD20, CD19 AND NOT CD20, CD20, CD3, LYM, not dead, root, singlets 1 1 24hi 38hi, 27- IgD-, 27- IgD+, 27+ IgD-, 27+ IgD+, 27hi 38hi, CD19, CD19 AND CD20, CD19 AND NOT CD20, CD20, CD3, LYM, not dead, root #vis the difference plot_diff(groups) # match reference match_result <- cqc_match(groups, ref = 1, select = c(2)) match_result {"
